tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP feel) (PP (IN like) (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS hairs))) (S (VP (VBG getting) (NP (ADJP (ADJP (JJR shorter)) (PRN (, ,) (ADVP (RB maybe)) (NP (NP (PRP$ its)) (PP (IN because) (NP (FW i)))))) (NN rash)) (PP (IN about) (NP (JJ short) (NN hair)))))) (. .)))
